TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program with an Estonian twist.

Articles.Content:
Howdy ya all!

So i started doing the youtube thing not long ago and now my attention is turned to KSP.

I started playing KSP when it was still in 0.1.3 i think... They just added Mun to the game so my history with this game goes way back when it was still in the dark sort of. So now i made my first video of KSP and i'm trying out the new Career mode which is a Great update to KSP universe. In my opinion the Career mode adds more to the point of the game, not just fly to different planets and that's it.

So hopefully you guys here like it and some of you even join my Youtopian society.

But for now, Stay Awesome KSP enthusiasts.

Edited November 29, 2013 by BigTimeTripod
